snippet: A look back at the skyrocketing hair, screaming miniskirts and sherbet-swirled Pucci dresses of the stylish suburbanites who dedicated their lives to the Mercury Space Program.
abstract: A look back at the skyrocketing hair, screaming miniskirts and sherbet-swirled Pucci dresses of the stylish suburbanites who dedicated their lives to the Mercury Space Program.

headline.main: The Real Housewives of NASA Astronauts
